name: DEKA
body: Designed and implemented terrain mapping algorithm on wheeled autonomous robot. Engineered solutions utilizing the popular Robot Operating System (ROS) library in C++. Gained experience in both software development and robotic systems integration.

name: AON Devices
body: Facilitated research into and development of neural networks for speech and motion recognition. Gained practical experience in Python including writing efficient algorithms and managing software development environments.

name: Litrinium
body: Collaborated with a team of employees in a design and testing lab. Designed semiconductor optical communication product validation tests that generated performance test reports and implemented them in Python. Developed skills in programming, soldering, and integrated circuit design.

name: Spectra-7
body: Collaborated with Spectra-7 employees in a remote product testing and customer support center. Participated in meetings with customers and suppliers. Developed procedures to test signal integrity in copper cables for high-speed connection between servers in data centers.
